mapper.select: select MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_INTRODUCE, MEMBER_ENABLED, AUTHKEY, AUTHSTATUS from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(member pk_member) */ ROWNUM rn, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_INTRODUCE, MEMBER_ENABLED, AUTHKEY, AUTHSTATUS from MEMBER where ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
